title: A true transcript and publication of His Maiesties letters pattent. For an office to be erected, and called the Publicke Register for generall Commerce Whereunto is annexed an ouerture and explanation of the nature and purport of the said office, for their better vnderstanding and direction that shall haue occasion to vse it, by Sir Arthur Gorges, Knight.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed at Britaine Bursse [by William Stansby] for Iohn Budge, and are there to bee sold at his shop,
